tip.text: Talk to a merchant from time to time. Remember, once you speak with a merchant, you're committed to purchasing something.
Clicking Instant Restock updates the shop with new merchandise.
Go visit a friend's house!
If you want to lease land, click the house icon in front of the site.
Clicking the [My House] button immediately moves you to the inside of your house.
The Adventurer Housing Policy allows each player to have a house.
You can place an entrance to your home on any land you lease.
Visit other people's houses and sign their guest books.
You can receive decoration gifts every day. The more elaborate your home decor, the better the gifts will be!
The higher the level of interior decorating, the more furnishings you can add.
You can purchase furniture in Build Mode. Show off your decorating skills!
In Build Mode you can decorate freely, even if you do not own any furnishings.
Home plans can be saved and used again later.
You can change your home's mood or set a password in Build Mode under My House settings.
You can change the rules of your house in Build Mode under My House settings.
The size and height of a house can be adjusted in Build Mode.
Decoration gifts can only be received once a day. Try to raise your decoration score as high as possible before receiving the gift.
Press the B key while on your property to launch Build Mode. You can then place items on your property.
Decorate your own home by arranging some furnishings.
You can rotate items placed on your property to face any direction you like.
You can buy and install furnishings while in Build Mode.
Visit the concessions merchant at events to buy and sell items.
Some concessions merchants sell rare items.
When you leave a house, you'll always return to your original location.
Some furnishings can be placed after earning a special trophy.
There might be special effects of placing souvenirs in your home!
You can place a mannequin on your property and dress it up with equipment. Try changing up its look every now and then.
You can turn the TV installed on your property on or off.
You can design and create your own items in the Maple Workshop.
You can design Build Items, just as you can design outfits.
You can make an item with your own name on it, and show it off around Maple World!
Express your personality with customizable items.
Visit $map:02000107$ if you want to switch up your style.
You can change your appearance at the Hair Salon and Plastic Surgery Office $map:02000107$.
Visit $map:02000107$ when you want a fresh new look, whether it be for your hair, face, skin tone, or something else.
Visit $map:52000010$ in $map:02000107$ to change your face.
Visit $map:52000008$ in $map:02000107$ to change your hair.
Speak with $npcName:11000256$ in $map:52000008$ on $map:02000107$ for some great new make-up.
$npcName:11000257$ in $map:52000009$ claims that your equipment can be dyed any color.
Change your hair, face, and skin in $map:02000107$!
You can upload images to the displays throughout towns to share them with others.
To upload an image to a display, you must make a reservation at least 3 hours in advance.
There are displays throughout the world where you can reserve time slots to display images to others.
Anyone can reserve time slots on a display.
Press the Set Portrait button to change your character's portrait.
When you arrive in a new town, the first thing to do is head over to the equipment shop.
Express yourself by performing an emote with the F1 - F12 keys.
Express yourself by performing an emote with the F1 - F5 keys.
Special furnishings like trigger editors and mannequins cannot be used in the Decor Planner, only placed.
Don't be fooled by a slime's cute appearance.
You don't need arrows for your bow.
You don't need to restock your thrown weapons.
You need spirit to use active skills.
Register your newly learned skill to a quickslot for ease of use.
Other players can break your tombstone to revive you on the spot.
Register your newly acquired items to the quickslots for ease of use.
There's a rumor that a new, revolutionary drug allows you to resist Shadow Toxin.
You can equip different thrown weapons to each of your hands.
You can equip thrown weapons to both your hands.
You can equip a different dagger to your left and right hands.
You can equip a different dagger to each of your hands.
After reviving, you will be Tombshocked for some time. Wait it out, or see a doctor.
If your health reaches 0 again while you still have the Tombshocked status, you will be under a metal tombstone.
After being tombstoned, you may choose to revive in place by spending mesos.
A magic hat sometimes appears on non-town maps. Enter the hat to discover a Pocket Realm hiding inside.
Enter the magic hats found out in the world to discover special mini-games and encounters!
Iron Hog's armor is famed for its sturdiness.
Ironically, there are no ants in the Ant Tunnel.
$npcName:22000022$, the ruler of the Winding Canyon, is female.
Eat an herb to gradually recover your health over time.
You cannot use potions when your health is full.
$npcName:22000003$ and $npcName:22000004$ are evil fairfolk sisters.
$npcName:23000019$ and $npcName:23000020$ are married.
You can change your keyboard settings in the Key Binding tab under Options.
Try jumping at a wall. Yep, you can hang on walls.
The Wall Climbers like high places.
Press the Alt or C key to jump.
Press the Ctrl or X key to attack.
After picking up many items, you'll be able to do it automatically.
You can pick up items by pressing the Z key.
While near a ladder, press the up arrow on your keyboard to cling to the ladder.
In $map:02000083$, you will not be fined for destruction of public property, even if you pull stoplights right out of the ground and swing them about!
You can learn a lot of information by utilizing the world map.
You can find the location of taxi stops on the world map.
Open the world map to see which maps have quests you can accept.
Open the world map to see your current location.
Open the world map to see where a boss appeared.
Curious to know which spots are booming right now? Check out the popular locations on the world map.
Doctors are usually found in big cities or hospitals.
Receive treatment from a doctor to get back in tip-top shape!
You can use skill points to learn a new skill or upgrade an existing one. Open your skill window to get started.
You can achieve titles by winning trophies.
You need to be close to a taxi stop to designate it as a destination.
Interact with a taxi stop to take a cab to any previously discovered taxi stop.
Reach level 25 to use a deluxe taxi.
Deluxe taxis arrive as soon as you call them.
Use the Rotors Air Taxi to instantly travel anywhere on the World Map.
Right-click a character to do any number of things, like whisper, trade, send a party invite, or add a friend.
Try right-clicking a passerby and sending a party invite.
10 is the maximum number of party members.
The community window displays players logged into the same map as you.
You can add friends through the community window, or by right-clicking their characters.
You can send a party invite by right-clicking a character.
To stop all messages from a character, right-click the character and select the block function.
You can trade by right-clicking a character.
Press Tab to enlarge the minimap.
Hover the mouse over the minimap's icons to view the names of NPCs and maps.
The settings button in the minimap's upper right corner allows you to display or hide information.
The top of the minimap shows which characters are logged into the same map.
Some monsters can be grabbed if you're close enough to them.
Double-click a mount to ride it.
Save a mount to a quickslot, then press the corresponding key to ride it.
Press the X key while atop your mount to use its unique skill.
When you're in your house, you can use your safe or call a primary physician whenever you want.
When you log out from your home, you will accrue rest experience.
Right-click in the chat window to open up chat settings.
Open your inventory and shift-click an item to link it to the chat window.
Press Tab key while typing a chat message to easily change the message recipient.
You need merets to use the world megaphone or the channel megaphone in the chat window.
You can defeat monsters faster if you team up with party members.
If you pass a stranger fighting an elite or boss monster, lend a helping hand!
If you run into an elite or boss monster, use teamwork to defeat it.
When you're up against an elite or boss monster, it's best to fight alongside others.
If you and another player fight an elite or boss monster together, you can still obtain loot. No need to be in a party!
You can receive a reward when fighting an elite or boss monster, even if you are not in the same party as others.
You cannot earn experience while tombstoned.
When reviving after being tombstoned, you will be immune to harm for a short period.
To revive a tombstoned player, attack their tombstone until its health gauge is depleted.
When you are defeated after recently reviving, you will be pinned under an indestructable metal tombstone.
You cannot free other players from under a metal tombstone.
Walk when traveling short distances. It's the healthy thing to do!
Be sure to check your mail in case a special item arrives.
There's a rumor that $map:2000001$'s guards are twins, but it's not true.
No one knows $npcName:11000374$'s gender.
$npcName:11000106$ is kind only to her man.
When you see a lever in front of you... Don't think, just pull it.
To see yourself better, use the mouse wheel to zoom the camera.
If you venture off the beaten path, you might just find some treasure chests.
You receive rest experience while you are in your home.
Items and mesos on the floor for more than 90 seconds will disappear. It's the 90-second rule!
No X marks the spot in this case! To find a treasure chest, you'll have to look carefully where you normally wouldn't.
Report inappropriate pictures on displays by right-clicking them.
Type /partyinvite charactername (or /pinvite) in the chat window to invite that character to the party.
Type /partyleave in the chat window to leave your current party.
Try pressing the G key to found a new guild.
Found a guild with a friend, one you have chemistry with!
Guild trophies include all guild members' trophies.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000001$ displays the Rank 1 guild trophy, Rank 1 personal trophy, and Rank 1 of the Maple Arena.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000100$ displays the guild emblems of whoever holds the guild trophies at Ranks 1, 2, and 3.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000023$ displays the character portraits the top 3 ranked individuals in the category of Personal Trophies.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000064$ displays the top-three ranked guild and personal trophies.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000051$ displays the guild emblems of those at Ranks 1, 2, and 3 in the Maple Arena.
The Flag of Honor at $map:02000051$ displays the guild emblems of those at Ranks 1, 2, and 3 in the Guild Championship.
The Flag of Honor is updated once a day.
Check the Flag of Honor, and you'll be able to see detailed rankings in Maview.
When you call up a saved template, the existing furnishings will be cleared and the new furnishings will be placed.
Type /guildinvite charactername (or /ginvite) in the chat window to invite that character to the guild.
$npcName:11000508$ is popular for many reasons.
$npcName:11000508$, the blacksmith at $map:02000203$, can make items even stronger.
In combat with other players, enchanted equipment is counterbalanced.
$npcName:11000511$ is quite immature.
$npcName:11000511$ is the only daughter of the Shuabritze lord.
If you escort $item:40100023$ to $npcName:11000511$, she will trade precious antiquities taken from her home.
$npcName:11000511$'s maid, May, is packing $item:40100023$ and other items to trade today.
High-level characters can fight one-on-one at $map:65000001$.
The winner at $map:65000001$ will continue to face challengers.
Up to 10 people can fight at $map:65000002$.
Report anyone that's harming the experience of other players.
If you see an inappropriate image on a display, you can right-click it to report it.
If you report someone using inappropriate language, that person's chat will be blinded.
If you report an inappropriate character portrait or display image, that image will be immediately hidden.
$npcName:11000514$ has never allowed even a single escape.
There's a rumor circling that if you pay $npcName:11000514$ bail money, you'll be released from prison.
Be careful! False reports are punishable.
Repeatedly causing harm to others will result in a penalty.
Those who break the rules and get a Penalty can no longer chat, use UGC, and more.
If you participate in prison labor, you can more quickly be relieved from your penalty.
False reports could lead to the reporter going to prison.
$npcName:11000585$ at $map:02000062$ is giving a tour of the prison.
Traits are unlocked at Level 50.
You get a Trait Point with every new level after Level 50.
Invite friends or guild members to have a group chat.
At $map:02000216$, items that are epic or of high rarity can be traded.
The fact that the Blackstar is running $map:02000216$ is a well-known "secret."
You can change the names of your assistants and their nickname for you from their Profile menu.
You can't do household chores in your staff's stead.
Some staff excel in cooking, such as $npcName:11000770$ and $npcName:11000780$.
Some staff excel in making drinks, such as $npcName:11000787$ and $npcName:11000779$.
Some staff excel in creating necklaces, such as $npcName:11000789$ and $npcName:11000512$.
Some staff excel in creating rings, such as $npcName:11000777$ and $npcName:11000544$.
$npcName:11000770$'s signature dish is the special unagi dish.
$npcName:11000786$ longs for $npcName:11000015$.
$npcName:11000777$ is a descendant of $npcName:11000708$, $npcName:11000075$'s pet cat.
$npcName:11000787$ says that he used to work as a bartender, somewhere in $map:02000100$.
$npcName:11000791$ is full of stories. Back when he was a hawker, he gossiped wherever he went.
$npcName:11000790$'s fortunetelling is not very trustworthy.
Each assistant has a different crafting specialty.
Helping Hands is a training agency for youths who dream of making Victoria a better place.
You can use a Transparency Badge to selectively hide gear.
You can only receive one souvenir buff at a time.
If you're feeling grubby, try installing a shower booth in your home.
Type "/?" in the chat window to see the chat commands.
Let's all use kind and considerate words!
Extracting an outfit yields special outfit crystals. Equipment at Level 20 or higher yields Onyx.
$item:40100024$ can be earned by extracting items that are epic or of higher rarity.
The guild member limit increases alongside the guild's level, up to a maximum of 100 members.
They say that $npcName:11000284$ lost the glass shoes.
$npcName:11000145$ claims to have come from the future.
You can obtain $item:13200028$ from $npcName:11000144$.
You can exchange mesos with other player via personal trades. Note that a small percentage will be taken as a handing fee.
Although all items can be equipped regardless of your job, weapons belonging to jobs other than your own will only be usable with the X button attack.
Items and mesos cannot be gifted through the mail.
Type "/search monstername" in the chat window to find information about that particular monster.
Use the Rosetta Beauty Salon to wear hats backwards.
You can preview how the equipped item will appear by shift+right-clicking the item in the shop.
Right-click a different character to view their character info.
Type "/changechannel channelnumber" (or /cc) to easily switch channels.
Runeblades strive to reach the pinnacle of strength by combining swordsmanship and rune magic.
Jibricia, the pioneer of rune magic, joined forces with Pelgia, the greatest swordsman in history to create the Runeblade collective known as Terrune Calibre.
The Eight Blades are a group of the greatest Runeblades of their generation.
$npc:11001229$ is the most popular of the Eight Blades, with a fanbase that who admires his righteous disposition and good looks.
Runeblades value the teachings of the Baaz, the spirits of their ancestors who still walk the earth.
Runeblades' techniques are deeply rooted in the teachings of their ancestors, the Baaz.
Runeblades use sharp swords designed for channeling magic, which they call Blades.
Runeblades have the ability to imbue their Blades with the powers of fire, ice, and lightning.
Runeblades can employ the mysterious powers of runes in various combat situations.
Women all over Calibre Island swoon over the gruff $npc:11001229$.
The rumor that $npcName:11001230$ has no belly button is patently false.
Rumor has it that $npcName:11000781$ caught nothing but prize fish in his time.
The rumor about $item:40100024$ being an abalone is not true.
Higher grade fish have a higher chance of breaking free.
You can fish anywhere there's enough water to swim. You cannot fish while you are swimming, however.
Bait increases your chance of catching something.
There's supposedly bait that attracts bigger fish.
Want to know where fish live? Open the Fish Album.
The higher a fishing hole's tier, the more difficult it is to gain Fishing Mastery there.
Different fish can be caught in different areas.
You can find special items while fishing.
Catching fish grants experience.
The higher a fish's grade, the rarer it is.
The appearance of your float improves as your fishing tier increases.
Fish aren't the only thing you can catch while fishing.
Check the World Map tooltip for available fishing holes in different maps and their tiers.
$npcName:11000781$ sells fishing equipment in $map:02000002$.
$npcName:11001449$ sells fishing equipment in $map:02010002$.
Want to become a fishing champ? Cast your rod wherever there's water!
You cannot fish from moving places.
Rumor has it that there's special bait that attracts rare fish.
To increase your Fishing Mastery, you must catch fish around your fishing tier.
The Royal Music Academy's mascots are Ducky and Duckling.
The Royal Music Academy's president, Didiana, was moved by Ducky's singing and discovered a love for music.
The Royal Music Academy sells instruments and music scores so that performers can spread the joy of music.
The Royal Music Academy's administrator, $npcName:11001320$, is good friends with $npcName:11001322$.
You can purchase music scores made by others and perform them.
If you have an instrument, you can form an ensemble with nearby party members.
You can use a blank music score to make your own unique song.
As your performance mastery increases, you'll do more flourishes while playing music.
You can improvise your performance without a music score.
You can use your instrument with a music score to perform.
When you play an instrument, nearby players will hear your performance.
If you don't want to hear the performance, lower the Instrument sound in the Sound tab under Environment Settings.
You cannot hear the performances of blocked characters.
$npcName:11001320$ in $map:02000001$ sells music scores for the piano and guitar.
If you want to purchase performance goods, go find $npcName:11001320$ in $map:02000001$.
If you want to purchase performance goods, go find $npcName:11001322$ in $map:02010002$.
After joining a guild, you can earn guild experience through various activities.
If you are in a guild, every hour of play earns guild experience.
If you are in a guild, participation in MC Kay's events will earn guild experience.
If you are in a guild, eliminating boss monsters earns guild experience.
Defeating a boss monster with other guild members earns bonus guild experience.
The guild activity index will display the amount of guild experience you have earned.
Guild contributions will reset every week.
Guild funds will increase proportionally to the guild experience earned.
Guild skills can be purchased by saving up guild funds.
Guild skills take effect 24 hours after joining a guild.
Enjoy events alongside your guild members!
Your must wait 24 hours after creating your guild to use the guild arcade.
The guild activity index resets every week.
Gemstones can be dismantled into gem dust, which is used for upgrades.
Gemstones can be upgraded to higher tiers.
The daily amount of ores that can be obtained through mining depends on the vein.
When your mining mastery rises, you'll be able to dig up more ores than before.
Mining mastery increases when you succeed in mining.
If you want to locate veins that can be mined, check the Mining tab in your Lifestyle menu.
When you dig up ore by mining, you will gain experience.
Check the World Map tooltip for available veins in different maps.
When you use a mining tool to mine, you'll get even more ores.
Mining tools are made through smithing.
All veins have a set mastery tier for mining.
The daily production from ranching depends on the animal.
When your ranching mastery rises, you'll get more goods from your livestock.
Collecting goods from ranching will earn you experience.
In the Ranching tab of the Furnishing menu, you can furnish your livestock pens.
Using a ranching tool will get you more goods.
Ranching tools are made through handicrafts.
All ranching livestock have a mastery tier for feeding.
When smithing mastery increases, the amount of materials needing for crafting decreases.
Check the items that can be made through smithing in the Smithing tab of the Lifestyle menu.
You can earn experience by crafting items via smithing.
Smithing mastery increases when you craft items.
Materials to craft items via smithing can be found through mining or ranching.
View the items that can be made with handicrafting in the Handicraft tab of the Lifestyle menu.
You gain experience by crafting items with handicrafts.
Handicraft mastery increases when you craft items.
You can find handicraft materials through mining and ranching.
Random dungeon party searches make it easy to find party members and dungeons appropriate for your level.
Clearing a random dungeon provides a random bonus.
Virtue runes can be created under the Enchants life skill category.
Virtue runes raise gear to higher enchantment tiers.
Each assistant is proficient in one of the following crafts: cooking, drink-mixing, necklace-making, or ring-making.
Once your character reaches level 50, you'll start earning prestige ranks.
Your prestige rank is shared by all characters on your account.
Characters Lv. 50+ make progress toward prestige ranks whenever they earn experience.
Increasing your prestige rank unlocks reward boxes.
The attribute points unlocked through prestige ranks can only be used on Lv. 50+ characters.
Prestige rank perks apply to every character on your account.
There's a limit to how much experience you can earn toward prestige ranks each day.
To enchant Epic or above gear at +11, you need some gear identical to the one you're trying to enchant. They'll be used for material.
When you fail an enchant, an enchantment charge will be added to the piece of gear you tried to enchant.
You can use Toad's Weapon Material in the place of the identical gear item required to enchant certain levels.
Make sure to feed your pet every day! They'll make you a lot stronger!
Accessory gemstones raise your power significantly.
Struggling with a dungeon or a raid? Ask for assistance using the Dungeon Helper system!
Don't forget to claim your weekly Prestige Rewards!
House souvenirs can improve your attack or defense temporarily for free.
Guilds offer useful buffs and rewards for their members!
Use the Party Finder menu to help you get into an organized group.
